original: Majjhima Nikāya 40
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cūḷaassapurasutta
analyzed: cūḍa assa pura sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā aṅgesu viharati assapuraṁ nāma aṅgānaṁ nigamo.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā aṅgesu viharati assapuram nāma aṅgānam nigamaḥ

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Samaṇā samaṇāti vo, bhikkhave, jano sañjānāti.
analyzed: samaṇā samaṇā iti vaḥ bhikkhave janaḥ sañjānāti

original: Tumhe ca pana ‘ke tumhe’ti puṭṭhā samānā ‘samaṇāmhā’ti paṭijānātha.
analyzed: tumhe ca pana ke tumhe iti puṭṭhā samānā samaṇāmha ati paṭijānātha

original: Tesaṁ vo, bhikkhave, evaṁsamaññānaṁ sataṁ evaṁpaṭiññānaṁ sataṁ:
analyzed: tesam vaḥ bhikkhave eva samaññānam satam eva paṭiññānam sata

original: ‘yā samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā taṁ paṭipajjissāma;
analyzed: yā samaṇa sāmīci paṭipadā tam paṭipajjissāma

original: evaṁ no ayaṁ amhākaṁ samaññā ca saccā bhavissati paṭiññā ca bhūtā;
analyzed: evam naḥ ayam amhākam samaññā ca saccā bhavissati paṭiññā ca bhūtā

original: yesañca mayaṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjāma,
analyzed: yesam ca mayam cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhāram paribhuñjāma

original: tesaṁ te kārā amhesu mahapphalā bhavissanti mahānisaṁsā, amhākañcevāyaṁ pabbajjā
analyzed: tesam te kārāḥ amhesu mahapphalāḥ bhavissanti mahā nisasāḥ amhākam ca iva ayam pabbajjā

original: avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā’ti.
analyzed: avañjhā bhavissati saphalā

original: Evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam hi vaḥ bhikkhave sikkhitabba

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno hoti?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave bhikkhu na samaṇa sāmīci paṭipadam paṭipannaḥ hoti

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā appahīnā hoti, byāpannacittassa
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā appahīnā hoti byāpanna cittassa

original: byāpādo appahīno hoti, kodhanassa kodho appahīno hoti, upanāhissa upanāho appahīno
analyzed: byāpādaḥ appahīnaḥ hoti kodhanassa kodho appahīnaḥ hoti upanāhissa upanāhaḥ appahīnaḥ

original: hoti, makkhissa makkho appahīno hoti, paḷāsissa paḷāso appahīno hoti, issukissa issā
analyzed: hoti makkhissa makkhaḥ appahīnaḥ hoti paḷāsissa paḷāsaḥ appahīnaḥ hoti issukissa issā

original: appahīnā hoti, maccharissa macchariyaṁ appahīnaṁ hoti, saṭhassa sāṭheyyaṁ appahīnaṁ
analyzed: appahīnā hoti maccharissa macchariyam appahīnam hoti saṭhassa sāṭheyyam appahīna

original: hoti, māyāvissa māyā appahīnā hoti, pāpicchassa pāpikā icchā appahīnā hoti, micchādiṭṭhikassa
analyzed: hoti māyāvissa māyā appahīnā hoti pāpicchassa pāpikā icchā appahīnā hoti micchādiṭṭhikassa

original: micchādiṭṭhi appahīnā hoti—
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi appahīnā hoti

original: imesaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, samaṇamalānaṁ samaṇadosānaṁ samaṇakasaṭānaṁ āpāyikānaṁ ṭhānānaṁ duggativedaniyānaṁ appahānā ‘na samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: imesam kho aha bhikkhave samaṇa malānam samaṇa dosānam samaṇa kasaṭānam āpāyikānam ṭhānānam duggati vedaniyānam appahānā na samaṇa sāmīci paṭipadam paṭipannaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, matajaṁ nāma āvudhajātaṁ ubhatodhāraṁ pītanisitaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave matajam nāma āvudha jātam ubhatas dhāram

original: Tadassa saṅghāṭiyā sampārutaṁ sampaliveṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: tat assa saṅghāṭiyā sampārutam sampaliveṭhita

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno pabbajjaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imassa bhikkhuno pabbajjam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭi dhāraṇa mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, acelakassa acelakamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave acelakassa acelaka mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, rajojallikassa rajojallikamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave rajojallikassa rajojallika mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, udakorohakassa udakorohaṇamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave udakorohakassa udakorohaṇa mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlikassa rukkhamūlikamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave rukkhamūlikassa rukkhamūlika mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, abbhokāsikassa abbhokāsikamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave abbhokāsikassa abbhokāsika mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ubbhaṭṭhakassa ubbhaṭṭhakamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave ubbhaṭṭhakassa ubbhaṭṭhaka mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, pariyāyabhattikassa pariyāyabhattikamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave pariyāya bhattikassa pariyāya bhattika mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, mantajjhāyakassa mantajjhāyakamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave manta jjhāyakassa manta jjhāyaka mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, jaṭilakassa jaṭādhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave jaṭilakassa jaṭā dhāraṇa mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Saṅghāṭikassa ce, bhikkhave, saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyetha,
analyzed: saṅghāṭikassa ce bhikkhave saṅghāṭi dhāraṇa mattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyetha

original: byāpannacittassa byāpādo pahīyetha, kodhanassa kodho pahīyetha, upanāhissa upanāho
analyzed: byāpanna cittassa byāpādaḥ pahīyetha kodhanassa kodhaḥ pahīyetha upanāhissa upanāhaḥ

original: pahīyetha, makkhissa makkho pahīyetha, paḷāsissa paḷāso pahīyetha, issukissa issā
analyzed: pahīyetha makkhissa makkhaḥ pahīyetha paḷāsissa paḷāsaḥ pahīyetha issukissa issā

original: pahīyetha, maccharissa macchariyaṁ pahīyetha, saṭhassa sāṭheyyaṁ pahīyetha, māyāvissa
analyzed: pahīyetha maccharissa macchariyam pahīyetha saṭhassa sāṭheyyam pahīyetha māyāvissa

original: māyā pahīyetha, pāpicchassa pāpikā icchā pahīyetha, micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi
analyzed: māyā pahīyetha pāpa icchassa pāpikā icchā pahīyetha micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi

original: pahīyetha, tamenaṁ mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā jātameva naṁ saṅghāṭikaṁ kareyyuṁ, saṅghāṭikattameva samādapeyyuṁ:
analyzed: pahīyetha tam enam mitta amaccāḥ ñāti sālohitāḥ jātam eva nam saṅghāṭikam kareyyu saṅghāṭikattam eva samādapeyyu

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena
analyzed: ehi tva bhadra mukha saṅghāṭikaḥ hohi saṅghāṭikassa te sataḥ saṅghāṭi dhāraṇa mattena

original: abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati, byāpannacittassa byāpādo pahīyissati, kodhanassa
analyzed: abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati byāpanna cittassa byāpādaḥ pahīyissati kodhanassa

original: kodho pahīyissati, upanāhissa upanāho pahīyissati, makkhissa makkho pahīyissati,
analyzed: kodhaḥ pahīyissati upanāhissa upanāhaḥ pahīyissati makkhissa makkhaḥ pahīyissati

original: paḷāsissa paḷāso pahīyissati, issukissa issā pahīyissati, maccharissa macchariyaṁ
analyzed: paḷāsissa paḷāsaḥ pahīyissati issukissa issā pahīyissati maccharissa macchariya

original: pahīyissati, saṭhassa sāṭheyyaṁ pahīyissati, māyāvissa māyā pahīyissati, pāpicchassa
analyzed: pahīyissati saṭhassa sāṭheyyam pahīyissati māyāvissa māyā pahīyissati pāpicchassa

original: pāpikā icchā pahīyissati, micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīyissatī’ti.
analyzed: pāpikā icchā pahīyissati micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīyissati iti

original: Yasmā ca kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅghāṭikampi idhekaccaṁ passāmi abhijjhāluṁ byāpannacittaṁ
analyzed: yasmā ca kho aha bhikkhave saṅghāṭikam pi idha ekaccam passāmi abhijjhālum byāpanna citta

original: kodhanaṁ upanāhiṁ makkhiṁ paḷāsiṁ issukiṁ macchariṁ saṭhaṁ māyāviṁ pāpicchaṁ micchādiṭṭhikaṁ,
analyzed: kodhanam upanāhim makkhim paḷāsim issukim maccharim saṭham māyāvim pāpiccham micchādiṭṭhika

original: tasmā na saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: tasmā na saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭi dhāraṇa mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Acelakassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: acelakassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: rajojallikassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: rajojallikassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: udakorohakassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: udakorohakassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: rukkhamūlikassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: rukkhamūlikassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: abbhokāsikassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: abbhokāsikassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: ubbhaṭṭhakassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: ubbhaṭṭhakassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: pariyāyabhattikassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: pariyāyabhattikassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: mantajjhāyakassa ce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: manta jhāyakassa ce bhikkhave pe

original: jaṭilakassa ce, bhikkhave, jaṭādhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyetha, byāpannacittassa
analyzed: jaṭilakassa ce bhikkhave jaṭā dhāraṇa mattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyetha byāpanna cittassa

original: byāpādo pahīyetha, kodhanassa kodho pahīyetha, upanāhissa upanāho pahīyetha, makkhissa
analyzed: byāpādaḥ pahīyetha kodhanassa kodhaḥ pahīyetha upanāhissa upanāhaḥ pahīyetha makkhissa

original: makkho pahīyetha, paḷāsissa paḷāso pahīyetha, issukissa issā pahīyetha, maccharissa
analyzed: makkhaḥ pahīyetha paḷāsissa paḷāsaḥ pahīyetha issukissa issā pahīyetha maccharissa

original: macchariyaṁ pahīyetha, saṭhassa sāṭheyyaṁ pahīyetha, māyāvissa māyā pahīyetha, pāpicchassa
analyzed: macchariyam pahīyetha saṭhassa sāṭheyyam pahīyetha māyāvissa māyā pahīyetha pāpicchassa

original: pāpikā icchā pahīyetha, micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīyetha, tamenaṁ mittāmaccā
analyzed: pāpikā icchā pahīyetha micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīyetha tam enam mittāmaccā

original: ñātisālohitā jātameva naṁ jaṭilakaṁ kareyyuṁ, jaṭilakattameva samādapeyyuṁ:
analyzed: ñāti sālohitāḥ jātam eva nam jaṭilakam kareyyu jaṭilakattam eva samādapeyyu

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhadramukha, jaṭilako hohi, jaṭilakassa te sato jaṭādhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa
analyzed: ehi tva bhadra mukha jaṭilakaḥ hohi jaṭilakassa te sataḥ jaṭā dhāraṇa mattena abhijjhālussa

original: abhijjhā pahīyissati byāpannacittassa byāpādo pahīyissati, kodhanassa kodho pahīyissati
analyzed: abhijjhā pahīyissati byāpanna cittassa byāpādaḥ pahīyissati kodhanassa kodhaḥ pahīyissati

original: …pe… pāpicchassa pāpikā icchā pahīyissati micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīyissatī’ti.
analyzed: pe pāpa icchassa pāpikā icchā pahīyissati micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīyissati iti

original: Yasmā ca kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, jaṭilakampi idhekaccaṁ passāmi abhijjhāluṁ byāpannacittaṁ
analyzed: yasmā ca kho aha bhikkhave jaṭilakam pi idha ekaccam passāmi abhijjhālum byāpanna citta

original: kodhanaṁ upanāhiṁ makkhiṁ palāsiṁ issukiṁ macchariṁ saṭhaṁ māyāviṁ pāpicchaṁ micchādiṭṭhiṁ,
analyzed: kodhanam upanāhim makkhim palāsim issukim maccharim saṭham māyāvim pāpiccham micchādiṭṭhi

original: tasmā na jaṭilakassa jaṭādhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: tasmai na jaṭilakassa jaṭā dhāraṇa mattena sāmaññam vadāmi

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno hoti?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave bhikkhu samaṇa sāmīci paṭipadam paṭipannaḥ hoti

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīnā hoti, byāpannacittassa
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīnā hoti byāpanna cittassa

original: byāpādo pahīno hoti, kodhanassa kodho pahīno hoti, upanāhissa upanāho pahīno hoti,
analyzed: byāpādaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti kodhanassa kodho pahīnaḥ hoti upanāhissa upanāhaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti

original: makkhissa makkho pahīno hoti, paḷāsissa paḷāso pahīno hoti, issukissa issā pahīnā
analyzed: makkhissa makkhaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti paḷāsissa paḷāsaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti issukissa issā pahīnā

original: hoti, maccharissa macchariyaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti, saṭhassa sāṭheyyaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti, māyāvissa
analyzed: hoti maccharissa macchariyam pahīnam hoti saṭhassa sāṭheyyam pahīnam hoti māyāvissa

original: māyā pahīnā hoti, pāpicchassa pāpikā icchā pahīnā hoti, micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīnā hoti—
analyzed: māyā pahīnā hoti pāpicchassa pāpikā icchā pahīnā hoti micchādiṭṭhikassa micchādiṭṭhi pahīnā hoti

original: imesaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, samaṇamalānaṁ samaṇadosānaṁ samaṇakasaṭānaṁ āpāyikānaṁ ṭhānānaṁ duggativedaniyānaṁ pahānā ‘samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: imesam kho aha bhikkhave samaṇa malānam samaṇa dosānam samaṇa kasaṭānam āpāyikānam ṭhānānam duggati vedaniyānam pahānā samaṇa sāmīci paṭipadam paṭipannaḥ iti vadāmi

original: So sabbehi imehi pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi visuddhamattānaṁ samanupassati (…).
analyzed: so sabbehi imehi pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi visuddha mattānam samanupassati

original: Tassa sabbehi imehi pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi visuddhamattānaṁ samanupassato (…)
analyzed: tassa sabbehi imehi pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi visuddha mattānam samanupassataḥ

original: pāmojjaṁ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo
analyzed: pāmojjam jāyati pamuditassa pīti jāyati pīti manassa kāyo passambhati passaddha kāyo

original: sukhaṁ vedeti, sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati.
analyzed: sukham veda iti sukhinaḥ cittam samādhiyati

original: So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ,
analyzed: saḥ mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya

original: tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena
analyzed: tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam mettā sahagatena

original: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati

original: Karuṇāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
analyzed: karuṇā sahagatena cetasā pe

original: muditāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
analyzed: muditā sahagatena cetasā pe

original: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ,
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya

original: tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena
analyzed: tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam upekkhā sahagatena

original: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pokkharaṇī acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setakā supatitthā ramaṇīyā.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave pokkharaṇī acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setakā su patitthā ramaṇīyā

original: Puratthimāya cepi disāya puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
analyzed: puratthimāya ce pi disāya purisaḥ āgaccheyya ghamma abhitattaḥ ghamma pareto kilantaḥ tasitaḥ pipāsitaḥ

original: So taṁ pokkharaṇiṁ āgamma vineyya udakapipāsaṁ vineyya ghammapariḷāhaṁ …pe… pacchimāya
analyzed: so tam pokkharaṇim āgamma vineyya udaka pipāsam vineyya ghamma pariḷāham pe pacchimāya

original: cepi disāya puriso āgaccheyya …pe… uttarāya cepi disāya puriso āgaccheyya …pe… dakkhiṇāya
analyzed: ce ipi disāya purisaḥ āgaccheyya pe uttarāya ce ipi disāya purisaḥ āgaccheyya pe dakkhiṇāya

original: cepi disāya puriso āgaccheyya. Yato kuto cepi naṁ puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto
analyzed: ce ipi disāya purisaḥ āgaccheyya yatas kutas ce ipi nam purisaḥ āgaccheyya ghamma abhitatto

original: ghammapareto, kilanto tasito pipāsito. So taṁ pokkharaṇiṁ āgamma vineyya udakapipāsaṁ,
analyzed: ghamma paretaḥ kilantaḥ tasitaḥ pipāsitaḥ saḥ tam pokkharaṇim āgamma vineyya udaka pipāsa

original: vineyya ghammapariḷāhaṁ.
analyzed: vineyya ghammapariḷāha

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, khattiyakulā cepi agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti, so
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave khattiya kulā ca ipi agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti so

original: ca tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ āgamma, evaṁ mettaṁ karuṇaṁ muditaṁ upekkhaṁ
analyzed: ca tathāgata ppaveditam dhamma vinayam āgamma evam mettam karuṇam muditam upekkha

original: bhāvetvā labhati ajjhattaṁ vūpasamaṁ. Ajjhattaṁ vūpasamā ‘samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ
analyzed: bhāvetvā labhati ajjhattam ajjhattam vūpasama samaṇa sāmīci paṭipada

original: paṭipanno’ti vadāmi. Brāhmaṇakulā cepi …pe… vessakulā cepi …pe… suddakulā cepi …pe…
analyzed: paṭipannaḥ ti vadāmi brāhmaṇa kulā cepi pe vessa kulā cepi pe sudda kulā cepi pe

original: yasmā kasmā cepi kulā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti, so ca tathāgatappaveditaṁ
analyzed: yasmai kasmai ca ipi kulā agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti so ca tathāgata ppavedita

original: dhammavinayaṁ āgamma, evaṁ mettaṁ karuṇaṁ muditaṁ upekkhaṁ bhāvetvā labhati ajjhattaṁ vūpasamaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma vinayam āgamma evam mettam karuṇam muditam upekkham bhāvetvā labhati ajjhattam vūpasama

original: Ajjhattaṁ vūpasamā ‘samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: ajjhattam vūpasamā samaṇa sāmīci paṭipadam paṭipannaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Khattiyakulā cepi agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti.
analyzed: khattiya kulā ca ipi agārasmaā anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: So ca āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: saḥ ca āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati

original: Āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hoti. Brāhmaṇakulā cepi …pe… vessakulā cepi … suddakulā cepi
analyzed: āsavānam khayā samaṇaḥ hoti brāhmaṇa kulā cepi pe vessa kulā cepi sudda kulā cepi

original: … yasmā kasmā cepi kulā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti, so ca āsavānaṁ khayā
analyzed: yasmai kasmai ca ipi kulā agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti saḥ ca āsavānam khayā

original: anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
analyzed: anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja

original: viharati. Āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti.
analyzed: viharati āsavānam khayā samaṇaḥ hoti iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.

analyzed: mahā yamaka vaggaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ catuttho

analyzed: tassa uddāna
